SELECT
t1.*,t2.scount
count(distinct t1.gid) as sum
FROM good t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT t2.gid,SUM(t2.scount) AS scount FROM sell_record t2 WHERE date_format(t2.sdate,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') and status='1' GROUP BY gid) t2 ON t1.gid = t2.gid WHERE 1
limit ${startNum},${pageLength}

SELECT
date_format(t1.rdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as rdate, t1.rid,t1.eid,t2.ename,t2.eaccount,t3.pname,t1.rstatus as status, t1.rprofit,t1.rbatch,t1.filePath,t1.remark
count(*) as sum
FROM restock_record t1,employee t2,provider t3 WHERE t1.eid = t2.eid AND t1.pid = t3.pid
limit ${startNum},${pageLength}
